title: Intermediate German - Complex Discourse & Abstract Concepts

questions.question: Hättest du das Projekt angenommen, wenn du gewusst hättest, wie viel Arbeit es bedeutet?
questions.englishTranslation: Would you have accepted the project if you had known how much work it meant?

questions.englishTranslation: What could have happened if the presentation had not been successful?

questions.question: Er behauptet, dass er die Deadline eingehalten habe, obwohl...
questions.englishTranslation: He claims that he met the deadline, although everyone knows he delivered a week late.
